summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4838 for the improvement of Bradford Street, from Renton Avenue to 32nd Avenue South; by grading the same, under Ordinance No. 55712, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
